thread.section_title: Zodee Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Zodee | zodee.com.au
thread.title: Pip

author: Pip
title: Pip
text: I ordered bathers on boxing day and received my parcel on the 20th of March. I has originally entered the wrong address so not Zodee's fault, then with many emails it was sent to the wrong address once again then back to Zodee who then denied knowledge of the new address then was eventually sent to my address again. Now i have beautiful bathers and Summer is over. Ill never purchase here again.
